title: AI StudyBuddy
description:
Problem: Students often struggle to find relevant YouTube videos or notes for a concept.
Challenge: Build an AI agent that suggests YouTube videos, blogs, or lecture notes based on a typed topic .

title: EduGame: Learn While You Play
description:
Problem: Learning AI/DS basics is boring for many students.
Challenge: Build a mini browser game (quiz/puzzle) that teaches AI/ML basics interactively.

title: EcoTrack – AI for Daily Sustainability
description:
Problem: People want to track their carbon footprint but don’t know how.
Challenge: Create a tool that scans a product or activity (like commuting, using plastic), and estimates its environmental impact using AI.

title: HackGPT Challenge Generator
description:
Problem: Hackathon organizers need creative problem statements.
Challenge: Build an AI bot that generates 5 challenge ideas based on a theme using GPT
